statements: DELETE FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE trial_id = 100 AND medication_name = 'Medicine A';
DELETE FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE disease_name = 'Cancer' AND effectiveness_score > 0.8;
DELETE FROM trial_results WHERE patient_id = 100 AND duration_in_days > 30;
DELETE FROM clinical_trials WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin' AND disease_name = 'Headache';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM trial_results WHERE patient_id = 100 AND outcome = 'successful';
DELETE FROM measurements WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM patients WHERE age > 60);
